TopicTitle: Who Composes Some of KSP's Music?

Articles.Content: I know that most of the music is from Kevin MacLeod the title theme is from Victor but tracks like Space Music 2 don't really have a composer (that I know of). I have been going deep in the web and haven't found anything. Does somebody know who also composes some of the in-game music? I'm really stuck and I wanted to recreate the music and I don't have perfect pitch.
I believe HarvesteR himself did some of the music.
Thanks, it was hard because I couldn't find any of them and they didn't have social media when I was looking.
